channel.title: DDS special don't hit high! HELP (like 4-0, 1-3)

item.title: DDS special don't hit high! HELP (like 4-0, 1-3)
item.dc:creator: @rohafin rohafin
item.description:
@rohafin wrote:

jc22493:

What are your methods for the special?[/quote][quote=“Jordiescape, post:2, topic:239112”]Show me your DDS special attack method(s).

Here it is [code]public void DDSSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 0;
SpecDamgNPC(42);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 0;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(42);
SpecialDelay -= 0;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(42);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 0;
        startAnimation(0x426);
        actionTimer = 0;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 0;
    }
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@rohafin wrote:

Pic and title show what is the problem

[side=18]I beg you, if you can help my do it PLEASE [/side]

method(s)[code]public void DDSSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 0;
SpecDamgNPC(42);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 0;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(42);
SpecialDelay -= 0;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(42);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 0;
        startAnimation(0x426);
        actionTimer = 0;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 0;
    }
}[/code]
